Product name: Set Of 5 Made To Order Picture Frames - Custom Picture Frames - Frame Collage
Description:
This listing is for a set of 5 shabby chic frames. These frames are hand selected and painted by me. I have been dealing with ornate vintage picture frames for over 6 years. I try to find the highest quality and detailing to accent your walls with charm and beauty. I specialize in antique frames and ovals. The pictures are some of my work for other satisfied customers.
What you will receive in an order of five}
Five plain frames -
These frames are to be painted your choice of one color
The frames will vary in style. The sizes range from 3 inches to 8x10. If you need larger, please ask.
The materials will include wood, metal, resin, plastic or ceramic
The frames will range from simple molding and a mix of plain
Mix Ornate Frames -      
These frames will vary in style and size
Sizes start at 3 inches and run up to 10x13
This set will include a variety of very detailed frames, a mix of oval and square
The materials will include brass, metal, wood, resin, plastic or ceramic
All Frames
Once the order is completed, it takes up to 7 days to finish the frames. A picture will be sent for full approval of the work. Please feel free to read my feedback from other satisfied customers. My main goal is to provide one of a kind frame orders and an hassle free and enjoyable way for customers to obtain the home décor they're looking for.
If you are looking for style of painting such as distressed, color highlighted or an antique process, please ask. If your needing more then 5 frames, please ask and I can help you. Need chalkboards for one or more frames, just ask. Larger frames may require a higher shipping amount. Processing time 2 to 3 weeks.
Thank you,
rusticathart

Product name: Vintage Marion Weeber Cherry Buttons Celluloid Set of Five
Description:
A set of five vintage celluloid  buttons in the form of cherries.  The buttons were designed by the renowned industrial and button designer Marion Weeber, circa 1940's.
Each button measures about 1 1/8" X 1".  They have metal loop shanks.  They are all in very good vintage condition, with vivid color and usable quality.  
They will be sold as a set only.  A rare opportunity to enjoy this set of five charming buttons.

Product name: Antique Chinese Hair Pin Qing Dynasty Late 1800s Kingfisher Jade Flowers Birds Dangles Signed
Description:
This elegant antique Chinese hair pin dates to the late 1800s.  It features an ornate design with five dangles.  There are only remnants of the kingfisher feathers that originally adorned this piece.  There are also small jade flowers,  faux pearls and small birds.   The whole piece measures 7.75" long.  The top measures 2" across.  The five dangles wiggle when the pin is worn.  There appears to be maker's mark on the back (please see last photo).  I'm not sure what the metal content is on this piece.  There is darkening on the metal and the pearl finish has worn off the glass beads of the faux pearls.  This rare piece is worthy of restoration or wearing as it is.    This will be shipped via USPS Priority within the United States.  
Non-smoking environment.
I ship worldwide.   Please contact me BEFORE checking out if you would like this shipped outside the United States.  
I happily combine shipping to save you money.
Thank you for visiting Feralia Vintage! Please take a look around the shop: 
https://www.etsy.com/shop/FeraliaVintage

Description:
We currently have short 1-2 day (sometimes same-day) processing times & flat-rate shipping!
**A portion of all sales are donated to in-need Mamas and Babies at womens' shelters.**
_________________________________________________________________________________
Beautiful and functional! Keep baby's pacifier or toy from falling to the ground.
Buy 1 Non-Personalised for 14   (16 for personalized)
or
Buy 2 Non-Personalised for 26.5   (30 for 2 personalized)
or
Buy 3 Non-Personalised for for 39  (44 for 3 personalized)
ADD A TEETHER!
Make a gorgeous gift set:
Add-on a crochet wood teether ring here: 
https://www.etsy.com/ca/listing/477959623
Add-on a wood or silicone teether here: 
https://www.etsy.com/ca/listing/476598393
(Crochet&wood ring / elephant teether toy shown in pictures are SOLD SEPARATELY)
COLOURS!
Available in 20 spectacular colour schemes (see picture 2). Looking to buy a pair or set of 3 in different colours? Just select the "2DifferentColor(Pair)" or "3DifferentColor(Set)" options in the colour dropdown menu, then leave me a message with your colour choices :-)
PERSONALIZATION!
I am happy to personalize the wood clip end with baby's name or initials using heat (no nasty chemicals) - select a personalized option in the drop down menu and leave me a note during checkout with Baby's Name as you want it written.
LENGTH!
Measure approximately 11 inches (28 cm long) from clip to loop end.
****Love this design but looking for something more 'light-weight' for your newborn? Check out our all NEW Mini Boho Clips: 
https://www.etsy.com/ca/listing/505762105
 ******
CARE!
This is easy to care for. Spot clean with a damp cloth, or wash by hand (you can use a mild soap), rinse again, pat off excess water and air dry. I do not recommend submerging the clip in a water bath, as it is untreated wood and the pores and grain in the wooden clip can slowly open up with excess moisture. As with any natural wood item, if this does happen give it a quick polish with some fine-grit sandpaper to give it new life :-)
This item is handmade and as such may vary slightly in length and bead placement. Colors may appear different on your screen than in person due to individual screen/monitor settings. 
____________________________________________________________________________________
MATERIAL SAFETY: 
Our silicone beads are made of the highest quality FOOD-GRADE silicone. This silicone is made especially for silicone baby accessories. Silicone is scent and taste free. Beads are:
FDA Approved
BPA FREE, Phthalates FREE, Cadmium FREE, Lead FREE, 100% NON-TOXIC, & Mercury FREE
Wood is natural organic wood - it is completely UNTREATED and UNFINISHED = NO nasty chemicals for baby! 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
HOW TO ORDER: 
This listing is for ONE pacifier/toy clip. To order please:
1) CHOOSE colour (Image 2) - if you select one of the discounted sets of 2 or 3 clips please leave your colour choices in the "Note for Seller" section of the checkout.
2) CHOOSE personalized or no name option (Image 5). If you personalise please leave the name you'd like handwritten with heat on the wood clip.
3) Add it to Cart and enjoy FLAT-RATE shipping.
Sending this as a gift? We'd be happy to gift wrap this item for you for just 1 Canadian. See our ADD GIFT WRAP listing here: 
https://www.etsy.com/ca/listing/463150224/gift-wrap-add-on-for-peekaboochew?ref=shop_home_active_15
_____________________________________________________________________________________
USER SAFETY: 
As with any baby accessory this product should not be used without proper adult supervision. Never leave an infant or child unattended with this product. This product does contain small parts and the customer assumes full responsibility for ensuring that the product is used in a safe manner. By purchasing this product the customer agrees that use and purchase of the product is entirely at the customer's own risk. Peekaboo Chew, nor any of its agents, affiliates, or contact providers shall be liable in any way for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of use of the products. 
Periodically check product and discard immediately if it shows any signs of wear and tear or damage.
Never use pacifier clip without a pacifier, toy, teether, or sippy cup attached to the loop end. The loop is long enough to cause baby to gag if he/she sucks it to the back of his/her mouth.
____________________________________________________________________________________
PeekabooChew is a one Mama operation based on Vancouver Island, Canada. We are excited to offer AFFORDABLE accessories for Baby and Mama. 
I am happy to build you a custom order. Just message me :-)

Owner, Operator, Designer

Description:
Gorgeous tiara for your little princess!! You will get one clear rhinestone, gold tiara crown measuring approximately 3-3.25 inches. This tiara (made of alloy, gold plating) was designed specifically for One True Wish and is about 1 inch bigger in size to most of the tiaras being sold on Etsy!! 
 
Due to the weight of the tiara, a partially lined alligator clip will be added to each headband to allow the tiara to stand up and stay in place - as shown in the last picture.  You can also pick to have the tiara placed on a clip with no elastic.  
*** PLEASE READ:  For newborn photographs, the tiara can lie on the head or be held standing in place by the elastic. If you want the tiara to stand up and stay in place, please pick "Elastic Clip" so the clip will be added for stability. ***
The headbands are sized as follows:
Newborn - 12.5 inches
0-3 months - 14 inches
3-6 months - 15 inches
6-12 Months - 16 inches 
12 months-Teen - 17.5 inches 
Adult - 18 inches 
The tiara will come with a WHITE elastic. If you prefer another color of elastic, please message me ... I have lots of colors so just ask!  The elastic used is 1/8 inch skinny elastic that is hidden and not visible through the tiara.  A larger elastic can be requested, but it will be visible when looking at the tiara....please message me with any questions.  Felt is used to make sure everything is soft against the head.

Description:
'I AFFIRM...' is a deck of 40 affirmation cards.  Each card features a unique and inspiring affirmation, bordered by a mandala design.  Words and art by me, Katrina Smith.
Pick an affirmation card and place it somewhere that will catch your eye on a daily basis, to act as a constant reminder of the soul-ful change you desire.
Each affirmation card is 10cm x 10cm.  They are high quality heavy-weight cards, and are printed locally to me on the Gold Coast.  The 40 cards come in a sturdy natural-recycled-card box for storage.
A 'taste' of the affirmations...
"I see their soul & remember to love."
"I simply allow all to unfold at the perfect time."
"I start each day with a grateful heart."
"I trust my passions will reveal to me my purpose."
"I choose to live rather than just exist."
"I follow my heart wherever it may lead me."

Product name: 5 Cardboard Emanelo Cigar Boxes for Crafting Projects B20
Description:
This cool set of Emanelo cigar boxes was found at a local auction. We came across an entire unopened box of cigar boxes that still had the manufacture stamp on the outside of the box! We have not been able to ascertain when this actual brand was manufactured, but we believe these to be entirely modern. We think that these would make awesome craft project boxes!
You will receive 5 boxes with this listing. We aren't sure, but we think that these were never used to store cigars. We couldn't detect any tobacco odor in them. It does look like there is a little bit of wear to the corners on some of the boxes.
These boxes measure approx. 8 1/2 inches long by 6 1/2 inches wide. They are about an inch deep.
These boxes would love to be re-purposed as containers for your sewing sundries, vintage buttons, or vintage marbles. These would also be a unique box to ship your handmade items in. 
Shipping is automatically combined on multiple purchases. We have estimated shipping for a 3 pound package to the West Coast from our zip code. Shipping may be less if you live closer. Please contact us for an actual postage quote to your zip code.

Product name: 1 foot brass solder wire, 20 gauge, contains 38% silver, also known as soldering wire and brazing wire, good color match for red brass, 1 ft
Description:
One foot of wire.  The wire you get is coiled and secured with twist ties.
Here is a 38% silver brazing alloy that is a good color match for your brass metal creations.  
I have experimented with this solder wire on both red brass and genuine bronze.  The result is that I have found this particular solder wire to be a very good color match to red brass (yellow brass has not be attempted)  This solder hardens to a  light, bright gold that blends very nicely with the red brass bezel and wires that I carry.  It also stayed golden after filing and sanding.
As for genuine bronze, it makes a makes a solid join but is not an exact color match for the pinkish gold of genuine bronze.  It was not terribly noticeable as a different color, just not a perfect match and a heavy application of this solder on genuine bronze may show a slight color difference.  For a solder wire you might like for genuine bronze, please see the link to a 30% silver solder below which provides a better (more pink) color match.   
Specs:
Country of Origin:  USA
Solidus temp:  1200 F (650 C)
Liquidus temp:  1330 F (721 C)
Thickness:  20ga (approx .80 mm)
Silver:  38%
Copper:  32%
Zinc:  28%
Tin: 2%
Soldering your own metal pieces is fun!  Cut into tiny pieces using your solder cutters inside a plastic bag to keep the pieces from flying around the room.  Use safety glasses to protect your eyes from flying pieces of solder!   Do not cut solder in the presence of children or others without eye protection.  Avoid creating and breathing metal dust and fumes in a non-ventilated space.  Always have a carbon monoxide detector in the room with you!  Have fun and be safe creating what you imagine.
Remember to clean your metal, flux your joins and make sure your joins have a tight fit before soldering.  Solder is never meant to fill gaps in joins.  Always use the least amount of solder necessary to create the join!  I like to use a sticky flux and a tiny paintbrush to place my teeny pieces of solder right where they need to be.  
Link to 30% silver solder wire:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/225896876/1-foot-brass-or-bronze-brazing-wire-20?ref=shop_home_active_1
Copper solder wire is available here:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/198586237/4-feet-18ga-copper-solder-wire-brazing?ref=shop_home_active_5&ga_search_query=copper%2Bsolder
Check out more copper, brass and bronze supplies here:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/TheSparkleStore?section_id=15241312&ref=shopsection_leftnav_3

Product name: Dried Willow Stems / Weaving / Basketry Willow / Crafting / Home Decor / 25 Stems / 60" Length / Hurdles
Description:
***Due to the large package size, shipping costs vary over a wide range depending on order size and delivery location. If you would like to place a larger order please contact us and we will create a custom listing with detailed shipping cost to meet your needs. We will respond very quickly to your questions and get orders out fast! We can sell these willow stems in bunches of 10, 50, 100, 150, and 200. Please don't hesitate to contact us with questions!***
We personally plant, grow, and harvest all of our willow products at Willow Grove Farms. Our small farm is located in Southern Indiana. We are continuing to expand our selection of willow stems on a yearly basis and have an ever changing allotment of willow products available. Currently, we have approximately 8 floral varieties that can add all ranges of height, color, and definition to all types of floral arrangements. We also grow several willow varieties that can be used in basket and furniture design. If you have any questions about our willow listings, additional willow varieties, or our farm please do not hesitate to contact us! For additional pictures and information about our business please visit www.willowgrovefarms.com. 
Our dried willow stems for weaving are straight long stems that measure 60" in length. We have a variety of colors available to meet all your weaving needs. These willow can be used for basketry, furniture, woven trellises, woven arches, and many other crafting projects. They could also be used for home decoration and in floral arrangements. A quick google search will yield unlimited possibilities for these willow stems. 
As with all our willow products, we are very open to custom orders and will cater to meet your needs. We can harvest these stems in lengths ranging from 3' - 7'. Please let us know if need these for a custom project!
Each bundle includes 25 stems and we will offer price breaks for larger quantities. Please contact us for a custom listing!

Product name: 12G - 00G | Captured Grey Seaglass | Mini Squids Made to Order | Gauged Glass Body Jewelry for Stretched Piercings by Glassheart
Description:
These earrings are made from borosilicate or Pyrex glass, which is a non-porous, hypoallergenic, material; perfectly suited for wearers with allergies to metals, or those wishing to stretch their ears.
PRICING: The price is for the pair, and these earrings are made to order.
***If you don't see your size and you would like to order a custom pair, made just for your specifications, shoot us a conversation.***
CARE: Before inserting the jewelry in your ears, wash gently with soap and water. Always make sure your hands are clean before handling your piercings. To reduce opportunities for breakage, it is suggested to take the jewelry out before showering, sleeping, and roughhousing :) Be very careful when styling hair, and use a snag free pillow if you need to keep the jewelry in at night. When removing jewelry, do so over a towel or a soft surface in case they fall. Please contact me if you have any specific questions.
VERY FRAGILE: When ordering Pyrex earrings, be aware that glass is very fragile and can break when put under stresses such as being dropped, or hit, or crushed in a hug, especially in these elegant hanging styles. Please wear glass responsibly!!! By purchasing this jewelry, you understand the risks, and assume all liability.
Keep checking back as the colors and styles continue to expand and evolve.
We'd love to stay in touch!

Product name: Handmade leather and hide sandals for men
Description:
Thongs for men type Giannutri with central knot
Hide insole
Upper in genuine vegetable tanned leather 
Outsole and heel in light not-slip rubber
Photo Color: Black
All our sandals are handmade in Tuscany through manual procedure and with the utmost attention to quality, in order to meet our customers' needs.
We use materials of the ancient tradition, such as hide for the insole, that is resistant to the abrasion and absorbs sweat at the same time. For the uppers we use vegetable-tanned leather, a tanning method based on ancient recipes and knowledge that make use of natural tannins.
The vegetable tanned leather absorbs the traces of our past in getting old without getting ruined. It is also enhanced by the colouring made by craftsmen at the request of the customer, that gives a antique-effect, personalizing even the shades: the proof of a natural product.

Product name: Gladiator Sandals, Lace up Sandals, Gladiator Lace ups, Tie up sandals, Leather sandals, Greek sandals, Lace ups, Sandals
Description:
Our Leather: All our sandals are made from genuine Greek and Italian leather. We source leather from local tanneries and each cowhide is made based on our selective specifications and standards. 
Our Soles: We have two main types of sole leather and rubber in various colors that can be found on the last picture of each listing.
Rubber soles: You can make you sandals with three types of rubber sole standard rubber, lightweight and shock abortive Vibram rubber and rubber with internal heel. 
Leather sole: We have two types of leather sole. Standard which consists from two layers of leather or leather sole with internal leather heel (recommended). All our leather sole sandals come with a rubber heel.
Please notice that leather is not a waterproof product and we would recommend you to avoid wearing sandals when it is raining. We are using wax and several products such as custom made paints with waterproof properties in order to maximize sole protection from water.
Size guide :
In order to choose your right size please place your feet vertically against the wall and put under your heel a taped blank paper. Mark using a pen or pencil your longest part of foot and measure the distance of the heel to toe using a ruler. Repeat with the other foot as right and left sizes might be different. Add one cm or 0.4 inches to your measurement and using this result you can choose your size from our chart below.  If you have any special requirements such as narrow or wide fit please contact us before ordering to make a sandal based on your needs.
Length of sandals: 
US........... EU ............CM……..Inches
5 ............ 36 …...........23.4......9.21
6 .............37 …...........24.2......9.52
7 .............38 ..............25.0......9.84 
8 .............39...............25.5......9.97
9 .............40...............26.3.....10.35
10............41...............26.9…..10.6
11 ...........42...............27.6......10.86                                                                                                                 
12 .......... 43...............28.4…...11.18
Half sizes are also available please send us a message
Feel free to contact us for any further information regarding our sandals.
Thank you!

Product name: Greek sandals, Sandals, Gladiator sandals, Leather sandals, Rose gold sandals, Strappy sandals ,Summer sandals, Wedding sandals, SERENADE
Description:
Greek leather sandals that are simple and unique!
This ultra comfortable pair of sandals is designed to surround your feet.
Curves and brades come gently together offering beauty and strength.
The ultimate choice for the bold and charming. 
Our finest quality materials are:
Genuine leather for leather straps and insole, that comes from the island of Crete and it is famous for it's superior quality and uniqueness. 
Two types of durable and flexible italian rubber are used for our handmade soles, that are officially patented. Enjoy plenty miles of comfortable walk , and your anti slippery sandal's soles will be always on shape.
Details & Care :
The leather will soften and take the shape of your foot, hugging your every step.
Natural brown leather will darken with wear and exposure to sunlight, becoming more and more beautifull as time passes by. Sometimes has some small natural marks or light color irregularities. These are absolutely physical, as no chemicals are used.
Feet's Measuring with 3 simple steps :
•Stand up and place your feet on a blank paper.
•Draw the outline and mark the tip of your first big toe
and the middle of your heel.
•Measure the distance between these two marks, adding an extra 1cm/0,4 inch (5mm for top and 5mm for back) for comfort.
•You re done! Choose what sole size fits you better.
If you fall between sizes,prefer to order up the next size.

Product name: extra long gladiator sandals , Strappy sandals ,  long spider black sandals , steampunk , made from swimwear swimsuit lycra , vegan sandals
Description:
Extra long Gladiator black sandals made from swim wear swim suit Lycra 
Black over the knee high spider sandals. These sandals are a hand made new style of a foot wear. The sandal is created from  top quality swim wear Lycra fabric that fit the leg like a second skin.  the sandals decorated with hand made cuts & knots that give this unique gladiator look. The sole is made from plastic and rubber , making it very light on the feet.
SPIDER SANDALS  comes in six sizes : 36, 37, 38, 39, 40, 41.
Before buying the sandals I recommend to measure your feet from toe to heal & to check your measurement for the sizing.
Spider sandals are not made to be washed , but if they get extremely dirty it is possible to dip them in a bucket with water, gently clean them & to dry  flat in the shade.
measurement list:
euro size ............ us size............... measurement of your feet in cm.
 36...................... 5-5.5 .................... 23.5 cm
 37...................... 6-6.5 ................... 24 cm
 38...................... 7-7.5 ................... 24.5 cm
 39...................... 8-8.5 ................... 25 cm
 40...................... 9-9.5 ................... 25.5 cm
 41...................... 10 ................... 26 cm
If you are not sure about the size you need to order, i recommend to go for the bigger size. it is always more comfortable to walk with a sandal that is 0.5 cm bigger then smaller.
when you buy the sandal pleas give me a note of the size you need.
thank you for joining us in our GOA MAGIC life style.

Description:
Dear Visitor
Welcome to my store where you will find simple, comfortable and absolutely stylish Greek Summer Sandals and colourful handbags all made of real leather.We offer plain leather summer flats but also beautifully decorated boho sandals. In our store you can find tie up gladiators and amazing quality bags made in classic natural colours or you can opt for our best seller strappy sandals in rose gold, silver or beige colour.
All our products are designed by me and handmade by skilled craftsmen using traditional techniques used for centuries. All items are made to order with the exception of some best sellers which we have produced in advance. All sandals are made using real leather therefore there will be variations between styles. Moreover, all sandals made of natural tan leather will age beautifully with time. They all tend to darken as you wear them or when exposed to the sun which makes them even better after every wear.
